Class Tax

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Taxes.Tax
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class Tax
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class Tax is an interface for all taxes.
    It has methods:
    calculateTax()
    NewCalculate()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract double calculateTax()
      Method calculates the amount of money which must be paid monthly Each tax has his own implementation ( is calculated differently) that's why method is abstract It is used at the moment of creating a tax for the first time
      void NewCalculate()
      Method is made to change or show how much money must be payed relatively to this tax

      void Pay(double sum)

      • calculateTax

        public abstract double calculateTax()
        Method calculates the amount of money which must be paid monthly Each tax has his own implementation ( is calculated differently) that's why method is abstract It is used at the moment of creating a tax for the first time
        Returns:
        the amount of money which must be paid monthly
        See Also:
        Tax
